publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7545 Cathy Peattie: Domestic Abuse. Together We Can Stop It—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of Scottish Women’s Aid’s new campaign, Domestic abuse. Together we can stop it, during the 16 Days of Activism Against Gender Violence, 25 November to 10 December 2010; congratulates Scottish Women’s Aid on the launch of the campaign website, http://www.togetherwecanstopit.org/, and encourages widespread support for the campaign and its advocacy of 10 things you can do to stop domestic abuse.

S3M-7545 Domestic Abuse. Together We Can Stop It (lodged on 6 December 2010) Patricia Ferguson*, Gil Paterson*, Marlyn Glen*, David Whitton*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*, Mike Pringle*, Christina McKelvie*, Pauline McNeill*, Robin Harper*, Johann Lamont*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Stewart Maxwell*, Nanette Milne*, Jackie Baillie*, Bob Doris*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-7545 Domestic Abuse. Together We Can Stop It (lodged on 6 December 2010) Dr Richard Simpson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Patrick Harvie*, Sarah Boyack*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rhona Brankin*, Stuart McMillan*
